source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.title: DIY Script Coverage

visible_instructors.title: Scribble Online

visible_instructors.name: Scribble

items.headline: Develop industry-standard script coverage to analyse scripts for self-assessment or peer support in creative circles
objectives_summary: How to develop an industry-standard script coverage report.
Identify a range of industry key terms used when reviewing and analysing scripts.
Assess your strengths and stumbling blocks in relation to your current project using script analysis.

items.title: Helicopter Joystick with Arduino for pc Flight Simulators
items.headline: Build your helicopter home controls
objectives_summary: With this course you will learn how to create your own home helicopter controls using an arduino and you will be able to use it on Microsoft Flight Simulator, X-Plane 11, DCS, Aerofly FS 2 and many others.

items.title: A Painter´s Process - From Idea to Finished Artwork
items.headline: Level Up Your Creative Process, Compose an Original Artwork, Build Your Professional Portfolio, Overcome Procrastination
objectives_summary: Overcome a creative block or procrastination
Prepare, compose, paint a finished, polished piece of artwork
Differentiate between a painting and an artwork

items.title: Creative Writing
items.headline: Developing fiction writing skills using guided writing exercises.
objectives_summary: Fiction writing will improve with exercises that develop technique and knowledge.

items.title: Learn the Secrets of a Successful Background Performer!
items.headline: Learn Tips and Tricks of Working as a Background Performer, Background Actor, or Extra in TV and Movies
objectives_summary: Understand background agents.
Unlock the secrets of surviving on set.
Understand the job description of a background performer or extra.

items.title: Poetri's Poetry Workshop
items.headline: Laughing While Learning
objectives_summary: To be a better writer. Become a more effective speaker. Learn how to command the stage or platform. Be more confident. Develop the skills needed for spoken communication.

items.title: How to Journal About Your Overseas Experiences
items.headline: A Mini-Course for Expats and Migrants
objectives_summary: Find out how to get started with journalling when you’re faced with a blank page
Preserve your favourite memories of your time abroad
Go deeper into your overseas experiences for personal growth

items.title: The Way of the Shaman, A Course
items.headline: By Enlighten University
objectives_summary: Shamanism
Altered States of Consciousness
Psychology and the interpretation of Dreams

items.title: How to Paint a Breaking Wave in Soft Pastels
items.headline: Seascape Painting in Soft Pastels. Learn to paint water and ocean waves.
objectives_summary: How to use soft pastels to paint a breaking wave
Students will learn how to do an underpainting wash over pastels for the base layer of the painting
Students will have a greater understanding of the anatomy of a wave

items.title: JOURNALING
items.headline: - organize, set challenges, learn techniques
objectives_summary: Journaling techniques, types of journaling, self-assessment, creative writing.

objectives_summary: How to Make Natural Soap

Making Basic GlycerinHow to Make Oatmeal Soap Soap

items.title: Portrait painting
items.headline: A color (themes) on black & white portrait painting oil color on canvas
objectives_summary: How to stripe the lines and shading to create dimension
How to grid a photo and analyze colors
How to draft the structure and sketch

items.title: How to Create Characters
items.headline: Learn how complex characters are born
objectives_summary: Understand how humans act and apply that to the characters
Create more complex characters
The limits of the character

items.title: Hollywood Screenwriting - From Concept to Draft
items.headline: How to Write a Slammin’ Screenplay
objectives_summary: Screenwriters will learn killer techniques to elevate their screenplays

items.title: Accelerated World Building
items.headline: Avoid feeling overwhelmed by learning what you need to invent and why!
objectives_summary: Everything involved in creating an Earth-like setting
What elements of a world they should build and why
The consequences of not inventing an element and how to mitigate that

items.title: Master the Art of Painting Waves
items.headline: Seascape Painting in Soft Pastels. Learn to Paint Water and Ocean Waves.
objectives_summary: How to paint a realistic ocean wave and surf with pastels.
